# What has been collected so far - by site

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-screen"}
library(googlesheets4)
df <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fP1I1lugnfi-a5LpVgvtp1PtdRObColtvioTAFMtYqo/edit#gid=0", skip = 1)

df |>
  gt::gt() |>
  gt::sub_missing(missing_text = "No data yet") |>
  gt::data_color(
    columns = !`Site/partner`,
    colors = scales::col_numeric(
      palette = paletteer::paletteer_d(
        palette = "ggsci::blue_material"
      ) %>%
        as.character(),
      domain = NULL
    )
  ) |>
  TeachingLab::gt_theme_tl()
```
